title: Lucid Dreaming
description: A love forbidden finds a way.
quote: I dream, I dream, I dream of you.
altHero: a blonde and a redhead woman lay in the grass
alt1: the women run through the woods in light flowing dresses, the vibe is ethereal
alt2: the women laugh and hold hands
alt3: the redhead leans against a tree and looks at the camera while the blonde gazes at her
alt4: closeup of the women holding hands with the sun shining behind
